description: Articles in this series examine shell companies masking real estate deals.
title: Towers of Secrecy: Piercing the Shell Companies
title_page: Towers of Secrecy: Piercing the Shell Companies - The New York Times
maintext:
Towers of Secrecy
Shell companies are used to shield the identities of buyers in the competition to secure condos at the Time Warner Center and other high-end buildings. This is the first installment in a five-part series.
By Louise Story and
